00028 #if !defined(_SPANDSP_PRIVATE_TIME_SCALE_H_)
00029 #define _SPANDSP_PRIVATE_TIME_SCALE_H_
00030 
00031 #define TIME_SCALE_MAX_SAMPLE_RATE  48000
00032 #define TIME_SCALE_MIN_PITCH        60
00033 #define TIME_SCALE_MAX_PITCH        250
00034 #define TIME_SCALE_BUF_LEN          (2*TIME_SCALE_MAX_SAMPLE_RATE/TIME_SCALE_MIN_PITCH)
00035 
00036 /*! Audio time scaling descriptor. */
00037 struct time_scale_state_s
00038 {
00039     int sample_rate;
00040     int min_pitch;
00041     int max_pitch;
00042     int buf_len;
00043     float playout_rate;
00044     double rcomp;
00045     double rate_nudge;
00046     int fill;
00047     int lcp;
00048     int16_t buf[TIME_SCALE_BUF_LEN];
00049 };
00050 
00051 #endif
